title: What is your experience with Dell? - Quora

response.answer_text: I joined Dell after my college and my experience is pretty good till now. Following are the things which I like most. ● flexibility in work. ● enough time to work on yourself. ● get enough support from seniors (mostly super seniors) ● fun activities(team outings) ● Reward for your contribution and annual hike. If you are a fresher or coming from service based company then it will be a good choice to join Dell.
